author: rlewisshell
msg: fixing testTypeConverter() for JDK 1.3 (where java.sql.Timestamp/java.util.Date equals() are problematic)

author: ehatcher
msg: modify "junit" target to run Test* tests, rather than TapestrySuite.  also added handy trick to run a single unit test - use 'ant -Dtestcase=<test case name>'

author: ehatcher
msg: standardize test case names.  tests (and only tests) should begin with Test* to make it <junit> friendly in Ant.

author: ehatcher
msg: add target that uses the builtin Ant <junit> task as well as one to generate an HTML report.  This is a first pass, and not quite as good as it could be.  For one, running TapestrySuite with <junit> is not optimal... it really should run test cases directly rather than a suite.

author: ehatcher
msg: #25117 - modify PageService to accept Object[] without getting a ClassCastException
